text.title: Spanish authorities arrest Yuriy Kolobov, former Ukrainian finance minister
text.head: Spanish authorities arrest Yuriy Kolobov, former Ukrainian finance minister
Sources

list.item: "Spain arrests Ukraine's ex-finance minister Yuri Kolobov" — The Economic Times , March 5, 2015
"Ukraine's former finance minister arrested in Spain" — BBC News Online , March 4, 2015
Sonya Dowsett, Elisabeth O'Leary. "Former Ukraine Finance Minister arrested on Spanish coast" — Yahoo! News , March 4, 2015
